name: FAKERunner
helpMarkDown: This task executes the FAKE build script specified.
author: Isaac Abraham

inputs.name: FakeScript
inputs.label: Path to FAKE script
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the FAKE build script.

inputs.name: WorkingDirectory
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The working directory (defaults to the root).

inputs.name: FakeToolPath
inputs.label: Path to FAKE executable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the FAKE executable.

inputs.name: FakeTarget
inputs.label: Name of FAKE build target
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally pick the FAKE target to run.

inputs.name: FakeArguments
inputs.label: Custom Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Other arguments passed to the FAKE script.

inputs.name: failOnStandardError
inputs.label: Fail on Standard Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will fail if any errors are written to the StandardError stream.
